title: About
text:
I’m Alex Oguchi, currently pursuing an M.S. in Business Analytics at the Rady School of Management, UC San Diego (expected June 2025). I also hold dual bachelor’s degrees in Business Economics and International Business, with a minor in Data Science.



Languages: Python, R, SQL, Stata

Libraries/Tools: Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-Learn, PyTorch, Tableau, Statsmodels, Git

Database/ETL: PostgresSQL, Snowflake, SQL-based pipelines

Visualization: Tableau, D3.js, Quarto, Matplotlib, Svelte

Spoken Languages: English, Japanese





E-Commerce Marketing Strategist, Ultima Supply (2022–present)
Marketing strategy, e-commerce ops, and trade negotiations
Student Coordinator, UCSD HDH (2023–2024)
Managed 90+ staff, coordinated renovations with administration, built training modules
Instructional Assistant, UCSD Economics Department (Early 2024) Helped students with Microeconomic Coursework (ECON 100A) via office hours and review sessions
Associate Intern, Japanese Travel Bureau USA (2022)
Process documentation, campaign analysis, and stakeholder research





M.S. Business Analytics, UC San Diego (2025)

B.S. Business Economics, B.A. International Business, UC San Diego (2024)

Minor: Data Science

title: Home
text:
Alex Oguchi
I’m a graduate student in Business Analytics at UC San Diego with a background in economics, international business, and data science. My work focuses on applied machine learning, data analysis, and building comprehensive analysis on data.
This site highlights selected projects in: - Data visualization (D3.js, Tableau, Svelte) - Machine learning (Scikit-learn, PyTorch) - ETL pipelines and data engineering (SQL, Postgres, Snowflake) - Data Analysis (Python, Pandas, Numpy, Statsmodels)
View my projects, learn more about me, or visit my GitHub.
